projects.title: The Array.reduce Method
projects.description: The reduce method executes a reducer function (that you provide) on each element of the array, resulting in a single output value.
projects.code: const total = numeros.reduce((total, numero) => total + numero, 0);

projects.title: The Array.forEach Method
projects.description: The forEach method executes a provided callback function once for every element in the array.

projects.title: The Array.map Method
projects.description: The map method executes a provided callback function once on every element in the array and it returns a new transformed array. that contains the results.
